p: TD is spread via the fecal–oral route due to poor food and water hygiene. It is caused by a variety of different pathogens including bacteria (50%–75% of cases), viruses (5%–20%), and parasites (0%–10%) Coinfection with more than one infection occurs in 10%–15% of cases. No pathogen is identified in 10%–50% of cases [ 66]. Enterotoxic Escherichia coli is the commonest cause of acute TD globally [ 64].
